metadata.description: Interface Node Subgraph for Eventric Tour Management Demo UI

nodes.name: ApplicationShell
nodes.description: Main application container with routing, global state providers, and toast notifications

nodes.name: CreateTourPage
nodes.description: Initial tour creation form where users input tour details and upload rider document

children.title: Create New Tour
children.subtitle: [ name of the tour goes here ]

children: [ name of the tour goes here ]

style.className: flex-1 bg-transparent text-sm font-normal leading-5 tracking-[-0.28px] text-[#FCFCFC] opacity-60
w-[200px] px-5 py-3 flex items-center justify-center gap-2 rounded-xl

nodes.name: SelectVenuesPage
nodes.description: Venue selection interface with calendar, location search, and venue list

children.title: Add Events on tour
children.subtitle: [ name of the tour goes here ]

children.label: Rider Digest
children.message: Analyzing venue compliance with your rider requirements

nodes.name: RiderValidationPage
nodes.description: AI-powered rider requirement validation and editing interface

children.title: Rider Validation
children.subtitle: [ name of the tour goes here ]

children.title: Audio
children.description: Full PA system with 32-channel mixing board

children.title: Backline
children.description: Full PA system with 32-channel mixing board

nodes.name: TourReviewPage
nodes.description: Final tour review showing venue compliance scores and detailed venue analysis

children.title: Tour Review
children.subtitle: Review the compliance status of your selected venues

suggestions: Invest in weather protection equipment and backup power systems
Work with venue to enhance technical infrastructure

nodes.name: AppHeader
nodes.description: Application header with logo, search, and user controls

style.className: flex items-center justify-end gap-6 px-6 py-4 bg-black/[0.34] backdrop-blur-sm
w-12 h-12 rounded-full border-[3px] border-white overflow-hidden

nodes.name: WizardNavigation
nodes.description: Step-by-step wizard navigation showing progress through tour creation flow

style.className: flex items-center justify-center gap-6 w-full pb-12
flex items-center gap-2 px-6 py-4 flex-1

nodes.name: VenueList
nodes.description: Compact list of selected venues with dates and locations

nodes.name: CalendarPicker
nodes.description: Interactive calendar for selecting tour dates

style.className: flex flex-col items-center gap-10 w-full h-full p-6

nodes.name: RiderCategorySidebar
nodes.description: Collapsible navigation sidebar for rider requirement categories

edges.label: route_to_home
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/' renders CreateTourPage (Index component)

edges.label: route_to_select_venues
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/select-venues' renders SelectVenuesPage

edges.label: route_to_rider_validation
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/rider-validation' renders RiderValidationPage

edges.label: route_to_tour_review
edges.details: React Router route definition: path='/tour-review' renders TourReviewPage

edges.label: route_to_not_found
edges.details: React Router catch-all route: path='*' renders NotFoundPage for undefined routes

edges.label: wizard_step_continue
edges.details: Continue button triggers navigate('/select-venues') via handleContinue function

edges.label: wizard_step_continue
edges.details: Continue button triggers navigate('/rider-validation') via handleContinue function

edges.label: wizard_step_continue
edges.details: Continue button triggers navigate('/tour-review') via handleContinue function

edges.label: return_to_home
edges.details: Link element with href='/' allows users to return to home page from 404 error

edges.label: wizard_step_1
edges.details: WizardSteps Link component for step 1 navigates to path='/' (Create Tour)

edges.label: wizard_step_2
edges.details: WizardSteps Link component for step 2 navigates to path='/select-venues'

edges.label: wizard_step_3
edges.details: WizardSteps Link component for step 3 navigates to path='/rider-validation'

edges.label: wizard_step_4
edges.details: WizardSteps Link component for step 4 navigates to path='/tour-review'

edges.label: uses_header
edges.details: CreateTourPage imports and renders Header component at the top of the page

edges.label: uses_wizard_navigation
edges.details: CreateTourPage imports and renders WizardSteps component to show wizard progress

edges.label: uses_calendar
edges.details: SelectVenuesPage imports and renders Calendar component for date selection

edges.label: uses_venue_list
edges.details: SelectVenuesPage imports and renders VenueList component to display selected venues

edges.label: uses_header
edges.details: RiderValidationPage imports and renders Header component at the top of the page

edges.label: uses_wizard_navigation
edges.details: RiderValidationPage imports and renders WizardSteps component to show wizard progress

edges.label: uses_rider_sidebar
edges.details: RiderValidationPage imports and renders RiderSidebar component for category navigation
